#58
IN THE HIGH COURT OF DELHI AT NEW DELHI

W.P.(C) 8137/2018
RAMESH HALDAR
..... Petitioner
versus
EAST DELHI MUNICIPAL CORPORATION ..... Respondent

For the Petitioner
:
